attributes.action: Minimum 5% pay rise for all NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS should be awarded a pay rise well above the normal rate. The whole nation realise the pivotal role they have and still are providing this country and its citizens. It is about time the government realised this and done something about it right now.
attributes.background: The government should immediately review the 1% pay rise for NHS staff. The amount awarded is an insult to the brave men and women who have worked through this pandemic. Without them we as a country would have crumbled.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004
